channel.title: Web Development on Austin Gebauer
channel.description: Recent content in Web Development on Austin Gebauer

item.title: How to use the theme on this website
item.description: My first Hugo website theme, Devise , was recently accepted into the Hugo themes gallery . I’m excited to share that you can now use it for your own website. You can find instructions for installing, configuring, and updating the theme here . I’d greatly appreciate a Github project star ‚≠ê if you like the theme. If you have an idea for a new feature or found a bug, please feel free to use Github issues to let me know.
